name: Bu - Trijam 51
description:
• All of the digitally painted art took me over 3 hour limit as very much learning how to draw, digital paint and animate.
  • Recommend to view in full screen mode and with headphones
  • Audio sound effects and music were not created by me but downloaded assets
  • Music is from Artlist a royalty free music subscription I have

Controls:

Keyboard
Up Arrow = Move Up
Down Arrow = Move Down
Left Arrow = Move Left
Right Arrow = Move Right

Things I ran out of time for:

  • Add chests to allow for health to be regained
  • Enemies that move around within the levels
  • More variation of enemies
  • Add perhaps an attack ability
  • Additional levels that increase in difficulty

Other Notes:

  • Felt confident enough to stream the creation over the weekend
  • Learnt and used isometric tilesets in Unity
  • First time creating all art assets in a painted style within the game
  • Started learning how to animate within spine software using bones
  • Used post processing effects to add more of a horror look and feel
  • Third ever "completed game" (they are never done) :D
